content: **please make sure you are logged in when purchasing this pattern so you get updates ** pattern is free on my blog 1 > *the alec leg warmers came about when my miss 16 wanted a pair and after > searching the internet and not finding > what she wanted she looked in my > crochet stitch book there she found > the wing stitch pattern that night i > got news my grandmas brother alec had > passed away so it was fitting the > wing stitch was chosen thus this > pattern is in honour of my great uncle > alec * **skill level ** intermediate **materials & tools ** 300 - 500m 10ply/aran/4 weight yarn in 2 colours 4 5mm & 5mm hook scissors needle to sew in ends **sizes ** 12 14 16 18 calf measured at the widest part of the calf **pattern notes ** * the leg warmer is worked flat then sewn up along the edge * a video tutorial has been made to help with the stitch pattern * the length of the leg warmer can be altered to your personal preference if you do this your yarn usage will be different than listed this pattern has been tested if you do find a mistake please email me at buttonnosedesigns16@gmail com for assistance after all we are only human and sometimes errors slip past us **disclaimer** this pattern is the property of natasha thorley please do not copy share or claim this pattern as your own also no video is to be made of this pattern without the permission of buttonnose crochet © buttonnose crochet 2022 1 https //payhip com/buttonnosecrochet/blog/patterns/alec-leg-warmers-free-crochet-pattern
